id: CUMIN - Instagram Planning Hub for Notion
name: CUMIN - Instagram Planning Hub for Notion
description: Cumin is the only instagram planning tool you'll ever need! A complete, easy to use tool that will allow you to plan your content, nail your instagram strategy, hashtag groups and much more!---Who is Cumin for?Cumin is for any person that has an instagram and wants to grow their account. For creators and businesses alike, Cumin will help you organize not only your content but also your strategy, goals and hashtags. ---What tools will you find in Cumin?1- The Planning Hub2- Content moodboard3- Go
